comments.author: mattleibow
comments.body:
I had a look and the reason nothing displays is because the canvas is in a vertical stack layout. This is not a problem exactly, but the real issue occurs because the canvas has no intrinsic size. The stack is asking the canvas for the size, the canvas says I have none and then the stack precedes to layout a 0 height stack.

You can probably use a grid or give the canvas a height. Let me know if this helps.

comments.author: AghaKhan
comments.body: The problem is solved because, for some reason, the SikaSharp only works with Grid containers.  I changed the container to Grid, and it worked fine. Thanks for your reply. Regards Agha
